languages.text: "В бедных слоях мало кто будет обращать внимание на странности в поведении и пропажу людей. А если и будет замечен выродок, то это спишут на мутации. А культы привлекают тех, кто слаб, ранен и станет легкой добычей для промывания мозгов. Это удобный плацдарм".

"The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."
languages.original_text: "В бедных слоях мало кто будет обращать внимание на странности в поведении и пропажу людей. А если и будет замечен выродок, то это спишут на мутации. А культы привлекают тех, кто слаб, ранен и станет легкой добычей для промывания мозгов. Это удобный плацдарм".

languages.text: “底层人群不太会注意到古怪的行为或失踪事件。即便真的有人目击到了基因怪物，也很有可能仅仅把对方误认为严重变异的变种人。除此之外，邪教成员还会吸引底层人员之中的弱者和伤者，而这些人很容易沦为教唆的牺牲品。总而言之，底层人群非常适合邪教发展壮大。”
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."

traits.locale_text: “底层人群不太会注意到古怪的行为或失踪事件。即便真的有人目击到了基因怪物，也很有可能仅仅把对方误认为严重变异的变种人。除此之外，邪教成员还会吸引底层人员之中的弱者和伤者，而这些人很容易沦为教唆的牺牲品。总而言之，底层人群非常适合邪教发展壮大。”

languages.text: «Los pobres son más proclives a hacer caso omiso de desapariciones o conductas extrañas. Aun cuando alguien vea un monstruo genético, es probable que lo considere una mutación extrema. Entre tanto, el culto atrae a los débiles y a los heridos, presas fáciles para sus adoctrinadores. En otras palabras: la plebe supone un caldo de cultivo muy fértil».
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."

traits.locale_text: «Los pobres son más proclives a hacer caso omiso de desapariciones o conductas extrañas. Aun cuando alguien vea un monstruo genético, es probable que lo considere una mutación extrema. Entre tanto, el culto atrae a los débiles y a los heridos, presas fáciles para sus adoctrinadores. En otras palabras: la plebe supone un caldo de cultivo muy fértil».

languages.text: 「貧乏人が奇妙な行動や失踪に注意を払うことはあまりありません。たとえ遺伝子が狂った怪物を見たとしても、突然変異のせいだと決めつけるでしょう。 一方、カルト教団は弱者や怪我人をおびきよせ、いたも簡単に洗脳します。 つまり、教化者にとっては格好の餌食なのです」
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."

traits.locale_text: 「貧乏人が奇妙な行動や失踪に注意を払うことはあまりありません。たとえ遺伝子が狂った怪物を見たとしても、突然変異のせいだと決めつけるでしょう。 一方、カルト教団は弱者や怪我人をおびきよせ、いたも簡単に洗脳します。 つまり、教化者にとっては格好の餌食なのです」

languages.text: "Die Armen achten weniger auf seltsame Verhaltensweisen oder verschwundene Personen. Selbst wenn sie ein genetisches Monster sehen, haken sie es als besonders schlimme Mutation ab. Gleichzeitig zieht der Kult die Schwachen und Verletzten an ... sie sind für seine Indoktrinatoren eine leichte Beute. Oder anders gesagt ... ein perfekter Sammelraum."
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."

traits.locale_text: "Die Armen achten weniger auf seltsame Verhaltensweisen oder verschwundene Personen. Selbst wenn sie ein genetisches Monster sehen, haken sie es als besonders schlimme Mutation ab. Gleichzeitig zieht der Kult die Schwachen und Verletzten an ... sie sind für seine Indoktrinatoren eine leichte Beute. Oder anders gesagt ... ein perfekter Sammelraum."

languages.text: « Les pauvres sont moins susceptibles de prêter attention aux comportements et disparitions inhabituels. Même si l'un d'entre eux apercevait un monstre génétique, il mettrait son apparence sur le compte d'une vilaine mutation. Et pendant ce temps, le culte est libre d'endoctriner les faibles et les blessés, autant de proies faciles pour leurs rabatteurs. En somme, les bas-fonds sont pour eux une base d'opérations fort commode. »
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."

Et pendant ce temps, le culte est libre d'endoctriner les faibles et les blessés, autant de proies faciles pour leurs rabatteurs. En somme, les bas-fonds sont pour eux une base d'opérations fort commode. »

languages.text: "Yoksulların tuhaf davranışlara ya da ortadan kaybolmalara dikkat etmeleri, daha düşük bir ihtimal. Kalıtsal bir canavar gören birisi çıksa bile bunu kötü bir mutasyona yoracaktır. Bu esnada tarikat da zayıf düşmüş ve yaralanmış olanları kendine çekiyor. Bunlar, beyin yıkayanlar için kolay hedef. Başka bir deyişle elverişli bir hazırlık noktası oluşturuyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The poor are less likely to pay attention to strange behaviour or disappearances. Even if someone sees a genetic monster, they will chalk it up to a bad case of mutation. Meanwhile, the cult attracts the weak and injured — easy prey for their indoctrinators. In other words, it makes for a convenient staging ground."
